characters.story: "YEE!" the apple and St. Bernard command sharply, radiating vitality and energy!
"JEE!" the wooden leg commands sharply - an indication of where he walked!
"TSIH?" he questions curiously about the phraseology in the contract.
"GWAY!" the tortoise sings cheerfully, slowly crossing the road!
"SHUNG?" the thread questions curiously - is this rope strong enough to climb?
"YING?" the insect questions curiously like a tortoise - are those flies buzzing around?
"HOO?" the insect questions curiously - the front part of the butterfly character.
"DYEH?" the insect questions curiously - the back part of the butterfly character.
"JIH!" the insect sings cheerfully - the front part of the spider character.
"JOO!" the insect sings cheerfully - the back part of the spider character.
"LWOH!" each horse commands sharply - the front part of the camel character.
"TWOH?" it questions curiously like a horse - the back part of the camel character.
"CHING!" the blue insect sings cheerfully - the front part of the dragonfly character through a telescope.
"TING?" the insect questions curiously at the royal court - the back part of the dragonfly character.
"FUNG!" the wind commands sharply as the male phoenix bird soars past the ceiling!
"HWAHNG?" the wind questions curiously about the female phoenix emperor.
The brave tree bends down drooping - the first part of the olive character.
The tree and magnifying glass bend down drooping - the second part of the olive character.
